name: Bakkt Holdings, Inc.
description: Bakkt Holdings, Inc. is a digital asset platform that aims to revolutionize the way individuals and institutions engage with digital assets. Founded in 2018 and headquartered in Atlanta, Georgia, Bakkt provides a secure and regulated environment for trading, storing, and transacting cryptocurrencies and other digital assets. The company offers a suite of products and services designed to enhance the utility and accessibility of digital currencies, including the Bakkt App, which allows users to buy, sell, and spend various cryptocurrencies. Bakkt also partners with merchants and businesses to integrate digital assets into their payment systems, making it easier for consumers to use these assets in everyday transactions. With a focus on compliance and security, Bakkt is committed to establishing trust in the digital economy and facilitating the mainstream adoption of cryptocurrencies. The company's mission is to unlock the value of digital assets, making them more useful and accessible for everyone.
